ul.li:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccination schedule (2-dose scheme)JE vaccination should be integrated into national immunization schedules in all areas where JE is recognized as a public health priorityJE vaccination should be integrated into national immunization schedules in all areas where JE is recognized as a public health priority Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE
Number of JE primary series doses administeredCount of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series")Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE

Should not vaccinate client with first JE dose as clients age is under 6 months.Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first JE dose.Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first JE dose. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE

Client is due for JE vaccination"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due""Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE
Should vaccinate client with first JE dose as no JE doses were administered and client is within the appropriate age range.Check for contraindications.Check for contraindications. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE
One JE primary series dose was administeredCount of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1 Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE
Should not vaccinate client with second JE dose as the latest JE dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago.Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second JE dose.Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second JE dose. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE
Should vaccinate client with second JE dose as the latest JE dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago.Check for contraindications.Check for contraindications. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE
Two JE primary series doses were administeredCount of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 2Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 2 Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE
JE immunization schedule is complete"Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines")"Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "JE vaccines") Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE
JE immunization schedule is complete. Two JE primary series doses were administered.Check for any other vaccines due.Check for any other vaccines due. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.InactivatedVerocell-derivedvaccine * Tabs: JE

Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.JE.Liverecombinantvaccine * Tabs: JE

Create a clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Pneumococcal.2doseswithboosterdose * Tabs: Pneumococcal
The client is immunocompromised, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccines are preferred in immunocompromised clients.The client is immunocompromised, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. The client is currently pregnant, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccines are preferred over live attenuated or live recombinant vaccines.The client is currently pregnant, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccines are preferred over live attenuated or live recombinant vaccines.The client is currently pregnant, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccines are preferred over live attenuated or live recombinant vaccines. description.value: Value Set for Decision Logic For Tab JE. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

code.value: Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccination schedule (2-dose scheme)
Number of JE primary series doses administered
Client is not due for JE vaccination
Should not vaccinate client with first JE dose as clients age is under 6 months.
No JE primary series doses were administered
Client is due for JE vaccination
Should vaccinate client with first JE dose as no JE doses were administered and client is within the appropriate age range.
One JE primary series dose was administered
Should not vaccinate client with second JE dose as the latest JE dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago.
Should vaccinate client with second JE dose as the latest JE dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago.
Two JE primary series doses were administered
JE immunization schedule is complete
JE immunization schedule is complete. Two JE primary series doses were administered.
Live attenuated vaccination schedule (1-dose scheme)
Should not vaccinate client with JE dose as clients age is less than 8 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first JE dose.
Should vaccinate client with JE dose as no JE dose was administered, client is within the appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in last 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.
Should not vaccinate client with JE dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first JE dose.
JE immunization schedule is complete. One JE primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.
Live recombinant vaccination schedule (1-dose scheme)
Should not vaccinate client with JE dose as clients age is less than 9 months.
Should vaccinate client with JE dose as no JE dose was administered, client is within the appropriate age range and no live vaccine was administered in past 4 weeks.
Should not vaccinate client with JE dose as live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks.
One JE primary series doses were administered
JE immunization schedule is complete. One JE primary series dose was administered.
The client is immunocomprised
Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
The client is immunocompromised, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccines are preferred in immunocompromised clients.
The client is currently pregnant
The client is currently pregnant, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccines are preferred over live attenuated or live recombinant vaccines.
